title: Indian Tomato Chutney
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon cooking oil', '1 teaspoon skinned split black lentils (urad dal)', '1 teaspoon mustard seed', '4 dried red chillies', '2 green chillies, chopped', '1 pinch asafoetida powder', '1 tablespoon cooking oil', '1/2 onion, chopped', '2 tomatoes, chopped', 'salt to taste', '4 tablespoons chopped coriander leaves']
